oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burn. Telegram in suppport of ratification.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unsigned (partial?) telegram in suppport of ratification to H.T. Burns (sic.). Sent from Marion, Ohio. #604. August 11, 1920.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's suffrage; Politics & government; Telegrams;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Your change of stand brings consternation to thousand (sic.) of women Beg you to force reversal and uphold integrity of state rights and majority rule."
